remarks: The second component of a closed walk is a word over the "vertices". (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 25-Jun-2018.)
statement:
clwlkfclwwlk.1 $e |- A = ( 1st ` c ) $.
clwlkfclwwlk.2 $e |- B = ( 2nd ` c ) $.
clwlkfclwwlk.c $e |- C = { c e. ( V ClWalks E ) | ( # ` A ) = N } $.
clwlkfclwwlk.f $e |- F = ( c e. C |-> ( B substr <. 0 , ( # ` A ) >. ) ) $.
clwlkfclwwlk2wrd $p |- ( c e. C -> B e. Word V ) $.
